mapper.insert: insert into board(id, boardWriter, boardPass, boardTitle, boardContents) values(board_seq.nextval, #{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents})
mapper.select: select * from board order by id asc
mapper.update: update board set boardWriter=#{boardWriter}, boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContents=#{boardContents} where id=#{id}
